## [1.3.2](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/compare/1.3.1...1.3.2) (2025-09-07)


### Bug Fixes

* **docs:** improve getting started and API reference docs ([76359e8](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/76359e8557d2358c86c3124f4e64d4ba3952890f))
* **logging:** error level logs should go to error log ([79430d7](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/79430d7e70ccdfc278e3e10b6a1b579e6570115f))
* **pre-commit:** pre-commit config ext should be yaml ([6e1d9b8](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/6e1d9b84f2c277fc62b5bd2409973d072a3e7f0d))
* **style:** adopt 'soar' as the canonical parameter name for the SoarClient object over 'client' ([85ba63e](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/85ba63ee7d0636e64f1da649384da718e91ecf8f))
* **test:** update declaration lines ([16eaa49](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/16eaa4970b892a03d4f51072a28004cf7a5c3433))





## [1.3.2](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/compare/1.3.1...1.3.2) (2025-09-07)


### Bug Fixes

* **logging:** error level logs should go to error log ([79430d7](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/79430d7e70ccdfc278e3e10b6a1b579e6570115f))
* **pre-commit:** pre-commit config ext should be yaml ([6e1d9b8](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/6e1d9b84f2c277fc62b5bd2409973d072a3e7f0d))
* **style:** adopt 'soar' as the canonical parameter name for the SoarClient object over 'client' ([85ba63e](https://github.com/phantomcyber/splunk-soar-sdk/commit/85ba63ee7d0636e64f1da649384da718e91ecf8f))
